dict.acceptation: 使自花授精；使近亲繁殖；

sent.orig: What is more important, tourists' photography is to accomplish! self-narrative" and! self-identity."
sent.trans: 更重要的是，旅游者拍摄照片更是为了完成“自我叙述”(self-narrative)与“自我认同”(self-identity)。

sent.orig: Self-efficacy (SE) is being applied into computer use, which was defined as computer self-efficacy (CSE).
sent.trans: 计算机自我效能感(computer self-efficacy,CSE)是自我效能感理论在计算机培训、计算机辅助技术使用等行为活动中的应用。

sent.orig: Self-trapping of Bose-Einstein condensates (BEC) in double-well trap is investigated.
sent.trans: 研究了双势阱玻色-爱因斯坦凝聚体系(BEC)的自俘获现象(self-trapping)。

sent.orig: In this case, in the form's OnCreate handler, Self refers to the form.
sent.trans: 既然如此，在窗体中OnCreate句柄，Self与窗体相关。

sent.orig: You will nearly always pass Self as the owner.
sent.trans: 你总是需要传递Self作为其所有者。
